footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Synergy: Nilou | Update Date: 09/11/2025 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Due to her Passives and the nature of her kit it is highly recommended to play her **with only Hydro and Dendro** teammates. 
However, the bottom two team can work while ignoring her Passives. 

The general team will be
*Nilou + Dendro applicator + Healer + Dendro/Hydro flex*. __Ayato, Yelan, Xingqiu, Barbara and Kokomi __are recommended, but do note Yelan's Damage increase and Mona's Omen debuff does **not** apply for Bloom. 
The Dendro characters recommended are __Nahida, Yaoyao, Baizhu, Kirara, Collei, Dendro Traveller__, although Tighnari, Kaveh or Al Haitham are functional too.
A healer is almost always needed due to Bloom damaging the active character.
